article: The three superstars were arriving at the airport and a large crowd of young people had already gathered there to welcome them.The police found it  _  to keep order after the plane landed and the performers  _  .They smiled and waved cheerfully at everybody.Dressed in the same pink shirts and light blue trousers, with long hair and musical instruments over their shoulders, they all looked  _  .
